# GuidUtility.ToShortString method

Converts a GUID to a short string.

```csharp
public static string ToShortString(this Guid guid)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| guid | The GUID. |

## Return Value

The short string, which is a 22-character case-sensitive string consisting of ASCII numbers, letters, hyphens, and/or underscores.
